title: How to tell when your champ is broken.
body: When you play a ranked game, and the carry has 15 kills and you have 1 and you still have 5k more damage than them.

replies.body: I agree with you 100%, when malph carries like everyone else in is in his suitcase.

Yea but I was brand and the carry was yasou, and he was rolling through people, I mean just cleaning house, and honestly I don't see any reason why he didn't blow me away in damage. Sure I'm a mage but he's a supercrit carry and he wasn't just last hitting, he was taking down people solo.

DoT champions regularly top damage charts because regen means that non-fatal damage they deal gets healed us before the fatal damage is dealt.

You make a good point, however even dot champions usually get beat by supercrit champs, because even though we have dots we don't have crit on top of it so while we get a few % of additional burn they never add up to a full 100% extra damage.
